message.body: Hey boobear! Just got back to my apartment, but I have terrrrrrrrrible reception here. You have a comp to Cabaret whenever you're able to come! Which would be...when? Miss / love you!!!
Excellent. I will figure that out...NOW. what's ur theatre's name?
Playhouse on Park, West Hartford CT
Hmm. If I come the 23rd for the 2pm can I sleep over? Then I can go to sharon from there...
Dude it's totes on my way! I'll be in north guilford visiting my nun aunt, then to u, then to sharon! Weee!
Duhhhhhh that's perfect - so you need a ticket for Saturday the 22nd?
No Sunday 23rd 2pm n we'll play n snuggle after then ill leave u for sexy sharon Monday morning/noon
You got it poopela-poopsy - can't wait to snug out and have you enter my den of iniquity.
